code: import tokenService from"./tokenService";var BASE_URL='/song/';export function getSong(songName){return fetch(BASE_URL+songName,{method:'GET',headers:{'Authorization':'Bearer '+tokenService.getToken()}}).then(function(res){if(res.ok)return res.json();return res.json().then(function(response){console.log(response);throw new Error(response.err);});});}
